const productData = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "MASSDROP X SENNHEISER HD 6XX HEADPHONES",
    image:
      "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQfTlLu0tDEwS74edWMXv9oizFX-5YyMdvpfw&usqp=CAU",
    productType: "openBackHeadphones",
    price: 220,
    rating: 5,
    offer: 27 ,
    totalSales: 7479,
     // Add the offer name property
    
  },
    {
      id: 2,
      name: "DROP + Boat smart wrist watch",
      image:
        "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRniN8t5D4Pis9o6m5_TQT-xpnRqfv5MMpBMA&usqp=CAU",
      productType: "smart watch",
      price: 11169,
      rating: 5,
      timeLeft: 24,
      totalSales: 6898
    },
    {
    
      id: 3,
      name: "NIKE Air shoes",
      image:
        "data:image/jpeg;base64, ",
      productType: "shoes",
      price: 3170,
      
      rating: 4,
      
      totalSales: 6347 
      
    } 
  ];
  export default productData;
